description: This stir-fry is a healthy side dish that comes together in only a few minutes.
ingredients: [{"name": "green beans (sitaw)", "units": "Cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "squash (kalabasa)", "units": "cups", "amount": 1.5}, {"name": "canola oil", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 2}, {"name": "dried shrimp (hibe)", "units": "tablespoons", "amount": 1.5}, {"name": "white onion", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "Garlic", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "water", "units": "Cup", "amount": 0.25}, {"name": "fish sauce (patis)", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "Pepper", "units": "to taste", "amount": null}, {"name": "Leeks", "units": "for garnish", "amount": null}]
instructions: Heat oil over medium heat on a wok and sauté hibe, onions, and garlic. Add the kalabasa and sauté for 1 minute. Add water and cover and allow to simmer until kalabasa is cooked, about 5 minutes, more water may be added if necessary. Once the kalabasa is almost cooked, add the sitaw and season with patis and pepper, cover. Allow to steam for 1-2 minutes, then turn off heat and leave the cover on for another minute to allow the sitaw to cook more.
